welcome_message_body: Welcome to Passo Fundo, Brazil! Get ready to immerse yourself in the charming atmosphere of this city known for its rich cultural heritage and vibrant local community. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Passo Fundo has to offer.

restaurants.name: Gallu's Restaurante
restaurants.description: Gallu's Restaurante is a mineiro restaurant located in Passo Fundo.
restaurants.address: R. Gen. Osório, 1036, Passo Fundo, RS, 99010-140

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Passo Fundo Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.
